classes.docstring: """Collect Fields declared on the base classes."""
classes.name: DeclarativeFieldsMetaclass

classes.docstring:
"""
    The main implementation of all the Form logic. Note that this class is
    different than Form. See the comments by the Form class for more info. Any
    improvements to the form API should be made to this class, not to the Form
    class.
    """
classes.name: BaseForm

classes.docstring: "A collection of Fields, plus their associated data."
classes.name: Form
